i.name: Ravenous Flock
i.description: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him. Swain can right-click an immobilized enemy champions to pull them closer to him, dealing damage and ripping out a Soul Fragment.

q.name: Death's Hand
q.description: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through targets killed. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.

w.name: Vision of Empire
w.description: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.

e.name: Nevermove
e.description: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits.

r.name: Demonic Ascension
r.description: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from the 3 closest enemy champions. After draining enough health, Swain can cast Demonflare to end his transformation and decimate nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire.

description: {{sbc|Innate - Ravenous:}} '''Swain''' can periodically target a nearby {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} enemy [[champion]] to rip out a {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} from them, dealing {{pp|20 to 105}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them 290-units towards him. The target cannot be pulled closer to 290-units from '''Swain'''.
Enemy champion deaths also leave behind a {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} for 16 seconds, which can be harvested 1 second after their death if '''Swain''' gets in range of them.

{{sbc|Innate - Flock:}} '''Swain's''' ravens bring the {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}} to him, {{sti|healing|link=true}} him for {{as|{{pp|3|key=%|4 to 7|1 to 11}} of his '''maximum''' health}}. '''Swain''' can store up to 5 {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}} in reserve, empowering {{ai|Demonflare|Swain}}.
i1.name: Ravenous Flock
notes: * The crows carrying the souls will only be seen by the enemies if they have {{tip|sight|vision}} of '''Swain'''.

riot.name: Ravenous Flock
riot.description: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him. Swain can right-click an immobilized enemy champions to pull them closer to him, dealing damage and ripping out a Soul Fragment.

riot.name: Death's Hand
riot.description: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through targets killed. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.
riot.tooltip:
Swain unleashes {{ e5 }} bolts of eldritch power that strike the first enemy they hit and pierce through enemies they kill. Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, plus {{ e2 }}% per additional bolt. Max Damage: {{ f2 }}.

Each unit killed by Death's Hand restores {{ f1 }} Mana ({{ e4 }}% max mana).

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' unleashes five bolts of eldritch power in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemies they hit. Enemies can intercept multiple bolts, taking '''bonus''' [[damage]].
Bolts that kill their targets continue onward and restore {{as|{{sti|mana|3% '''maximum''' mana}}}}. This can repeat indefinitely until the bolts reach their maximum distance.
q1.name: Death's Hand
notes: *The ability does not utilize projectiles, but its bolts can be intercepted by units that can withstand its damage.
** {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} '''can''' absorb / reduce the damage from the bolts, unless he dies to them.

riot.name: Vision of Empire
riot.description: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.
riot.tooltip:
Swain opens a demon eye up to {{ castrange }} range away that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows for {{ e4 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Champions hit grant Swain a Soul Fragment and are revealed for {{ e9 }} seconds.

Damage is reduced by {{ e6 }}% against minions.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' summons a demonic eye at the target area, {{tip|sight|revealing}} it for 2 seconds, which explodes after {{fd|1.5}} seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit, halved against minions, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
Enemy champions are {{tip|sight|revealed}} for an additional duration and have a {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} ripped from them.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|100/2 to 300/2}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}}}}
{{st|Slow Strength|{{ap|25 to 65}}%}}
w1.name: Vision of Empire
notes: * Even if [[spell shield]]ed, Swain will still acquire the {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}}.
* Enemies are able to see the VFX and hear the SFX of ''Vision of Empire'' through the [[fog of war]].

riot.name: Nevermove
riot.description: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits.
riot.tooltip:
Swain launches a wave of demonic power, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through.

Swain then commands the wave to return, detonating it on the first enemy hit. Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are rooted for {{ e3 }} seconds.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' launches a demonic wave in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies it passes through.

Upon reaching its maximum distance, the wave returns to '''Swain''', detonating at the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
e1.name: Nevermove

riot.name: Demonic Ascension
riot.description: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from the 3 closest enemy champions. After draining enough health, Swain can cast Demonflare to end his transformation and decimate nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire.
riot.tooltip:
Swain frees the demon within for {{ e3 }} seconds, gaining {{ e6 }} health. Every second, he drains the 3 closest enemy champions for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, healing him for {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health. After draining {{ f7 }} health, Swain gains the ability to cast Demonflare.

Demonflare: Swain unleashes a nova of soulfire dealing magic damage and ending his transformation. Damage per Soul Fragment: {{ e0 }} (+{{ f1 }}).

Current Damage: {{ f3 }}
Max Damage: {{ f2 }}

Swain can drain non-champions to heal for {{ e7 }}% of the normal amount.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' frees the demon within for 12 seconds, gaining  {{as|{{sti|health|'''bonus''' health}}}}.

While ''Demonic Ascension'' is active, '''Swain''' drains the 3 closest {{tip|sight|visible}} enemies to him, prioritizing champions, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to them each second, and {{sti|healing|link=true}} himself for each enemy hit, reduced by 80% against [[minion]]s and [[monster]]s.

After {{sti|healing|link=true|restoring}} {{as|{{pp|3|125;300;450|6 to 16}} health}} with ''Demonic Ascension'', '''Swain''' can end its effects early to cast {{ai|Demonflare|Swain}}, and automatically does so at the end of its duration.

If '''Swain''' dies while ''Demonic Ascension'' is active, he loses all of his stored {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}}. If '''Swain''' dies during the channel time of ''Demonic Ascension'', the cooldown and all {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}} are fully refunded.
leveling:
{{st|Damage per Second|{{ap|420/12 to 780/12 3}} {{as|(+ {{fd|14.167}}% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|420 to 780 3}} {{as|(+ 170% AP)}}}}
{{st|Heal per Second|{{ap|20 to 50 3}} {{as|(+ 16% AP)}}|Reduced Healing|{{ap|20*0.2 to 50*0.2 3}} {{as|(+ {{fd|3.2}}% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Champion Heal|{{ap|20*12 to 50*12 3}} {{as|(+ 192% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Minion Heal|{{ap|20*12*0.2 to 50*12*0.2 3}} {{as|(+ {{fd|38.4}}% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Demonic Ascension
notes: * {{ai|Demonic Ascension}} persists through revival effects (e.g {{ii|Guardian Angel}}, {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}}), thus allowing the {{as|health}} restored during it to still count for activating {{ai|Demonflare}}.
